I think you'd really enjoy "Final Destination"! It's a classic slasher movie with a clever premise and some great twists. Plus, it features a talented young cast, including Seann William Scott and Ali Larter.

If you're looking for something a bit more intense, I'd also recommend "Wolf Creek". This Aussie horror film is known for its graphic violence and unsettling atmosphere - but be warned, it's definitely not for the faint of heart!

If that doesn't catch your attention, I'd also recommend "Sorority Row". It's a fun, campy take on the slasher genre with some great performances from its young cast. The plot of trying to cover up a death only to be stalked by a killer is really engaging and might appeal to your love of what kind of story Final Destination tells!
